definition: Spirochaetes, phylum of extremophile bacteria/spiral-shaped bacterium, e.g. causing syphilis

pinyin: Bao1 rou2 shi4 luo2 xuan2 ti3
you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1
gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4

sentences.english: It had the spiral structure revealed by congo red.
sentences.chinese: 具有與剛果紅結合的螺旋結構。

sentences.english: These antennas are commonly used at earth-based stations in satellite communications systems.
sentences.chinese: 這種螺旋天線常用於無形通訊系統中的地面臺站。

sentences.english: Ramping can be applied to both offset and raster modes.
sentences.chinese: 對於偏距加工和行切加工都可以使用螺旋下切方式。

sentences.english: P9 had a coiled-coil region; all five proteins have no signal peptides.
sentences.chinese: P9蛋白有一個螺旋捲曲區域，五個蛋白均無信號肽。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss adhesive ileus features of multi-slice spiral CT imaging.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討粘連性腸梗阻的多層螺旋CT成像特徵。

sentences.english: Drill cross section profile(DCSP) is a characteristic parameter of drill helix flute form.
sentences.chinese: 橫向截形是麻花鑽螺旋麪容屑槽的一個特徵參數。

sentences.english: The pressure drop is analysised when screw-type distributors are used.
sentences.chinese: 分析了採用螺旋型分佈器時的壓力降。

sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation technology for Spirulina colour- pearled drink was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對螺旋藻珍珠粒飲料的製作技術進行了較深入地研究。

sentences.english: The result show that all the natural amino-acids will follow the rule of helix theory.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，氨基酸類化合物也遵從螺旋理論的規律。

sentences.english: The propeller turns a small d. c. generator .
sentences.chinese: 螺旋槳帶動一個小型直流發電機。

sentences.english: Several factors lead to this downward spiral of the unemployed.
sentences.chinese: 幾大因素使得失業狀況呈現螺旋形惡化。

sentences.english: Eccentricity and spiral angle have different effects on pressure.
sentences.chinese: 偏心率和螺旋角對油膜壓力有不同程度的影響。

sentences.english: Helical, Cine, Axial and Cluster Scans May be Prescibed Prospectively from ScoutView.
sentences.chinese: 進行螺旋，電影，軸掃，集束掃描。

sentences.english: Spirochetes Long spirally twisted bacteria surrounded by a flexible wall.
sentences.chinese: 是具有彈性外鞘的長形螺旋盤繞細菌。

sentences.english: Finally, for making internal gears , the forming principle by projected gear is recommended.
sentences.chinese: 內圓柱螺旋齒輪的投影齒輪造型原理。

sentences.english: The screw dislocation in the film strongly influences the properties of the YBCO.
sentences.chinese: 在薄膜中的螺旋位錯強烈地影響YBCO的性質。
